text: 9:11 Ofa Gami 26:14-39; Godɨn Araziba 28:15-68Ezɨ e Israelia bar nɨn Akar Gavgaviba abigha, nɨn akam barazir puvatɨ. Egha akɨrim ragha nɨn akam gasara. E arazir kuram nɨ gami. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ en arazir kuraba tuisigha gɨfa. Egha Akar Gavgavir kam nɨ Moses ganɨngizɨ an an osiri. Nɨ ivezir kuram gumazamizir akɨrim ragha nɨn akam gasaraziba me danɨngam. Nɨ ivezir kurar kam e gingegha gɨfa.
